metadata.name: Password Protected ZIP File Opened (Suspicious Filenames)
metadata.comment: Detects the extraction of password protected ZIP archives with suspicious file names. See the filename variable for more details on which file has been opened.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 5379 AND contains(lower(file.name), lower('microsoft_windows_shell_zipfolder:filename')) AND (contains(lower(file.name), lower('invoice')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('new order')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('rechnung')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('factura')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('delivery')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('purchase')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('order')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('payment'))))

output.summary: Detects the extraction of password protected ZIP archives with suspicious file names. See the filename variable for more details on which file has been opened.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate used of encrypted ZIP files Reference: https://twitter.com/sbousseaden/status/1523383197513379841
